name: MEC Done In A Day Hat - Unisex
description:
Hiking, running or exploring, keep your head covered while you're out doing what you do.Lightweight nylon with DWR and UPF 50+ to protect you from the weather.Polyester mesh side panels vent heat.Moisture wicking headband keeps sweat out of your eyes.Stiffened brim offers shade and helps block glare.Buckle, elastic and webbing on back adjusts to fit most heads.

        Sustainability
